website_summaries.verdict: This durable, wood-burning fire pit is a perfect addition to your outdoor space. Made from a thick steel build and black high-temperature paint, this fire pit is made to last.
pros: Fire bowl has two holes in the bottom to allow for drainage
Comes with mesh spark screen protector, wood grate, and poker
Thick steel build with sleek design

customer_reviews.title: Solid base, but wire top does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED 4/27/2018 Just got a chance to pull out the bottom portion from my fire pit. It is 100% covered in rust. I have put the cover on every time after using this, never let it sit out in the rain. I am really, really disappointed by this product. --- ORIGINAL REVIEW 4/20/2018 Bought this just over a year ago and have used it 10 or so times. Coated inside of bowl and wire top with 5 coats of high temperature grill paint after unwrapping just to provide extra protection from heat and rust damage. Also bought nice heavy duty cover to protect it from moisture. Screen lid is cheap and fell apart after only 10 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Firepit!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in the box with no damage or defects. It was very easy to assemble the pit. The pit is light and easy to carry and move. The pit is deep. well ventilated, and can hold alot of wood for a really nice fire. The top is also large and can cover the pit well without being obstructed by the wood. The design is unique and sharp looking. I have had many firepits before, and this one so far has been the best.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely styled and capable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Perfectly sized diameter and depth for small backyard fires. -Metal screen cover works great to prevent ash and embers from escaping -Attractive form/style Cons: -The faux painted finish is a bit tacky looking. -No easy way to clean out ashes This fire pit is used in my backyard which is an urban setting. They design could work for a contemporary or traditional styled home. The screen is key in a tight dry setting to prevent any chance of fire. You can fit a good amount of logs in it for a sizeable fire. You'll likely want to get a cover if you plan to keep it outside.

customer_reviews.title: The price is very good.

Wasn't quite wide enough for the existing space so filled in around the edges with decorative boulders for an economical solution. Now it's my favorite place in our yard.

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly for instant family fun

It is lightweight and easy to move in case you want to store it in the garage/shed to prolong its life. The coloration on it was more yellow gold vs bronze-ish gold as it appeared on my monitor. Still looks awesome and works great. Highly recommend so far.
